column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator for a record type for delta tables, N => New, M => Modify, D => Delete

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) are), XMK ​​(Cross Market).

column.name: BUSINESS_ENTITY_CODE
column.comment:
This attribute defines the business entity from which the Customer
receives the bill, i.e., AS, IS. Refers to the reference tabele
BUSINSS_ENTITY, where it is the unique identifier for an entry. Valid
values are the codes for the serviceprovider or MMO

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: BUSINESS_ENTITY_NAME
column.comment:
The name of the Business entity that will be displayed on the official
documentation.

column.name: ORIG_MARKET_CODE
column.comment:
Market_code aus KIAS. MMC= Vodafone Credit, MMO = Vodafone
Callya , PUC = Service Provider Credit, PUA = Service Provider Debit

column.name: BUSINESS_VAT_REG_NUM
column.comment: The TAX registration number related to the Business Entity.

column.name: BUSINESS_REGIST_NO
column.comment: The Business Registration number related to the Business Entity.

column.name: ADR_PRIMARY_LN
column.comment: The primary address line.

column.name: ADR_SECONDARY_LN
column.comment: The secondary address line.

column.name: BUSINESS_PHONE_NO
column.comment: The Business Entity Phone Number.

column.name: BUSINESS_FAX_NO
column.comment: The Business Entity Fax Number.

column.name: TOLL_FREE_NO
column.comment: The business entity Phone Number which ist free.

column.name: TOLL_FREE_DESC
column.comment: Description

column.name: ADR_CITY
column.comment: Name of the city

column.name: ADR_STATE_CODE
column.comment:
Used for the Customer Care section of the invoice; holds the
company's state code.

column.name: ADR_ZIP
column.comment: Zip Code

column.name: E_MAIL_ADDR
column.comment: eMail- Adresse

column.name: INTERNET_SITE
column.comment:
Used for the Customer Care section of the invoice; holds the
company's internet site address

column.name: CREDITOR_NO
column.comment:
Used for the Customer Care section of the invoice; holds the
creditor's phone number.

column.name: MB_ACTV_PWD_MTD
column.comment:
The method by which the mailbox password is determined during the
activation of a new subscriber. 1-method1 2-method2 3-method3 4-
method4

column.name: MB_RESET_PWD_MTD
column.comment:
The method by which the mailbox password is determined when the
mailbox password is reset. 1-method1 2-method2 3-method3 4-
method4

column.name: MB_RESUME_PWD_MTD
column.comment:
The method by which the mailbox password is determined when a
subscriber is resumed from cancellation. 1-method1 2-method2 3-
method3 4-method4

column.name: NETWORK_PROVIDER_IND
column.comment:
Indicates whether the business entity is the network provider or just a
service provider of the cellular company.

column.name: PARENT_BUS_ENT
column.comment:
For most entries, this is the same as the code for the business entity
itself. It should be populated if more than one entry in this table
belongs to the same company (e.g., due to acquisition)

column.name: SP_DESTINATION
column.comment: Service provider code

column.name: OWNED_BY_COMPANY
column.comment:
Indicates whether or not the service provider is owned by the network
provider.

column.name: SP_USER_ID
column.comment:
Contains a code used to identify the service providers, for requests
sent via the ASPC interface.

column.name: SP_DEALER_ID
column.comment: Dealer id of the sales force

column.name: PARTNER_ID
column.comment: Unique identification number

column.name: NIC
column.comment: Network Identification Code

column.name: SP_LIST_CODE
column.comment: The SP Code of the business entity as appear in SP_LIST table.

column.name: SP_REV_SHR_PCT
column.comment: Percent of the revenue sharing for MP

column.name: REV_SHR_ADJ_CD
column.comment: Adjustment reason code for the revenue sharing adjustment

column.name: DEF_PAM_LIMIT
column.comment: Default limit

column.name: IVR_EXTRA_SRV_IND
column.comment:
Indicates whether the customer of the service provider can add/
remove extra services via the IVR. 'Y' - the customer is allowed. 'N' -
the customer is not allowed

column.name: SND_LEGIT_PIN_LTR
column.comment:
Indicates whether the Legitimation PIN letter needs to be sent to SP
(relevant for PUC and PUA markets)

column.name: ACTV_ADDR_REQ_IND
column.comment: Indicator for active address request

column.name: MAF_CODE
column.comment:
MAF indicator. - To distinguish CDRs from regular SP with VPN from
ESP CDRs.

column.name: BPN_START_DATE
column.comment:
After this date/time the Service Provider will be taken into
consideration for BPN charge.

column.name: WAIVE_GEOCODING_SMS
column.comment: Indikator for waiving the geocoding SMS

column.name: STU_MIN_EFF_PER
column.comment:
Minimum number of days that the debit subscriber should be effective
before start using STU benefit.

column.name: STU_ELIG_RCHRG_DUR
column.comment:
Number of days that subscriber can use the STU benefit after
appropriate DCC recharge.

column.name: STU_MIN_RECHRG_AMT
column.comment:
Minimal DCC recharge amount that allows to the subscriber to be
eligible to use an STU benefit

column.name: STU_MIN_RST_INUSE_AMT
column.comment:
Minimal DCC recharge amount that resets the "In use" flag on the IN
of using STU benefit

column.name: STU_BARR_IND
column.comment:
Barring indicator for STU functionality - Indicator which shows whether
the Business Entity is Barred from Using STU functionality or not.

column.name: SP_TYPE
column.comment: Determines the service provider type, e.g. 'M' for M2M Customers

column.name: UC_NL
column.comment: Ultracard number location

column.name: BT_DON_BAR
column.comment: Account_type/Subtype is blocked to donate money (Balance Transfer).

column.name: BT_REC_BAR
column.comment: Account_type/Subtype is blocked to receive money (Balance Transfer).

column.name: MARGIN_TYPE
column.comment: Margin type

column.name: MARGIN_AMOUNT
column.comment: Margin amount

column.name: MARGIN_ADJ_RSN_CODE
column.comment: Margin adjustment reason code.

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
